p: (ii) Effects on the uterine histomorphology. The uterus of sham-operated animals was lined by a tall columnar epithelium ( Figure 3(a)). The uterus of OVX animals presented a low cuboidal epithelium. Following treatment with estradiol valerate only, or in coadministration with tamoxifen, uterine epithelial cells were similar to those of sham-operated animals, but with a reduced thickness. The uterine epithelium of animals cotreated with estradiol valerate and the aqueous extract of D. edulis was similar to that of the OVX control group.
